isis.stitle: ELECTRICAL SYSTEM TROUBLESHOOTING GUIDE - 9800 MODEL - CAB ACCESSORIES - OPERATION - CB Power Source

svcproc.title: CB Power Source
svcproc.para: With the key switch in the on or off position, power is supplied to (B2) battery stud, circuits 14H and 14AA, 20A fuse F5-D, and circuit 86J to CB radio power receptacle (40) or to CB radio power terminal. The ground path for the power terminals is circuits 86-GAJ, 86-GJ and 11-GB to the right cab ground stud (404), and the ground path for the receptacle is circuit 86-GJ and circuit 11-GB to right cab ground stud (404), thus providing a 12 volt CB radio power source.
